title: About
content: [Me My name is Ryan Watters. I am a content strategist, editor, writer, and web publisher living Chicago, IL. Here is some inline code. And one more Nested list item Testing list Testing list The Site Content All content for the site is written in clean, semantic markdown. Extensions to the markdown are rendered on the client, but ultimately, everything I&rsquo;ve written for this site is structured well enought to be ported to any static site generator that interprets .md files with embedded yaml.
